query:
SELECT 
  'hero_section' as table_name, COUNT(*) as has_bidId FROM information_schema.COLUMNS 
  WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'hero_section' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'bidId'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'tabs_content', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS 
  WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'tabs_content' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'bidId'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'team_members', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS 
  WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'team_members' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'bidId'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'projects', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS 
  WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'projects' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'bidId'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'comments', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS 
  WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'comments' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'bidId'
